alert.note: Alert for Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:45PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Flagler and southeastern St. Johns Counties through 415 PM EDT... At 345 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Crescent Beach, or 10 miles east of Hastings, moving east at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Marineland, Butler Beach, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Flagler; Coastal St. Johns; Inland Flagler; Inland St. Johns
